Sign.Name: Mileth Library Sign
Sign.Description: A sign describing the Mileth Library
Sign.Message: Mileth Library. Post educational events upon this bulletin. Study and discuss the Arts within.

Sign.Name: Mileth Lore Sign
Sign.Message: College Lore. Learn lore from an Aisling teacher within. See times for classes on the grey slate by the library.

Sign.Name: Mileth Literature Sign
Sign.Message: College Literature. Learn literature from an Aisling teacher within. See times for classes on the grey slate by the library.

Sign.Name: Mileth History Sign
Sign.Message: College History. Learn history from an Aisling teacher within. See times for classes on the grey slate by the library.

Sign.Name: Mileth Philosophy Sign
Sign.Message: College Philosophy. Learn philosophy from an Aisling teacher within. See times for classes on the grey slate by the library.

Sign.Name: College Contest Hall
Sign.Description: A board describing the Contest Hall
Sign.Message: College Contest Hall. A sad monument to a failed regime of usurpers, this abandoned building echoes with a bittersweet reminder of what once was, and a whispered promise of what may yet be again.
